com.revolsys.io.xml

Class StaxUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.revolsys.io.xml.StaxUtils

  • public final class StaxUtils
extends Object
    The StaxUtils class provides utility methods for processing XML using the XMLStreamReader class.
    Author:
    Paul Austin

      • skipToChildStartElements

        public static boolean skipToChildStartElements(XMLStreamReader parser,
                               Collection<QName> elementNames)
        Skip all events until the next start element which is a child of the current element has one of the elementNames.
        Parameters:
        parser - The STAX XML parser.
        elementNames - The names of the elements to find
        Returns:
        True if one of the elements was found.
        Throws:
        XMLStreamException - If an exception processing the XML occurs.

      • skipToChildStartElements

        elementNames - The names of the elements to find
        Returns:

      • skipToStartElements

        public static boolean skipToStartElements(XMLStreamReader parser,
                          Collection<QName> elementNames)
        Skip all events until the next start element event which is for an element with one of the elementNames.
        Parameters:
        parser - The STAX XML parser.
        elementNames - The names of the elements to find
        Returns:
        The name of the matching element, null if end of document is reached.
        Throws:
        XMLStreamException - If an exception processing the XML occurs.
